import React, { Component } from "react"; import item1 from "../img/item1.jpg"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { cartFetch } from "../Actions/userAction"; import axios from "axios"; class Cart extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); } componentDidMount() { axios .get("http://localhost:3001/user/getcartitembyid", { headers: { auth_token: localStorage.getItem("auth_token") } }) .then(data => { if (data) { console.log(data.data); this.props.cartFetch(data.data); } }) .catch(err => { if (err) console.log(err.response.data); }); } render() { console.log("props", this.props.cart); return (

); } } const mapStateToProps = state => { const { isLoggedIn, cart } = state; return { isLoggedIn, cart }; }; const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => { return { cartFetch: cartitems => dispatch(cartFetch(cartitems)) }; }; export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Cart);
